name: Hennessy V.S
description: Smooth and well-rounded, Hennessy V.S is perfect for mixing or enjoying on the rocks.

name: Hennessy V.S.O.P
description: A blend of eaux-de-vie aged in oak barrels. Rich and harmonious with a lasting finish.

name: Hennessy X.O
description: Exceptional cognac with deep complexity. A legendary blend for special moments.
